name: Horrible Beach
description:
A game made for the game jam: "i cant draw but want to make a game"

you gain coins for clicking on the beach visitors, those coins can be later used for buying super powers. super powers are much more powerfull and more effective way to earn coins but they have cooldowns

1. superpower 10s cooldown

2. superpower 30s cooldown

3. superpower 90s cooldown
